subject: Baseball
Organized Labor
Free Agents (Sports)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Curt Flood’s contributions to free agency were recognized during Hall of Fame weekend, but Miller’s role in galvanizing the players union continued to be overlooked.
